Any omputer bridge player will need similar understandings.Bidding is interesting be ause the meanings frequently overlap; there may be one ormore bids that are suitable (or nearly so) on any parti ular set of ards. Existing omputerprograms have simply mat hed possible bids against large databases giving their meanings,sear hing for that bid that best mat hes the ards that the ma hines hold.
